/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their red brick facades adding a touch of color to the urban landscape. Bare trees line the street, their leafless branches reaching out into the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting a warm glow over the scene. Cars and buses are seen driving down the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape.
